title: Crypto Portfolio AI:
description: Gathers real-time cryptocurrency data from multiple sources. Using AI algorithms, it analyzes this data to provide users with actionable insights for optimizing their investment strategies.

title: Weather Dashboard:
description: Utilizing Server-Side APIs, delivers instant weather updates for any location. Simplifying weather checking, it provides accurate forecasts at your fingertips.

title: README Generator:
description: The Node.js Professional README Generator utilizes Node.js and npm along with libraries like Inquirer.js and Markdown-it to simplify README file creation.
